questions.question_text: The objective of the investigation of an accident or incident shall be the:
options: Prevention of accidents or incidents and to help the judges
Prevention of accidents or incidents and to help the manufacturers in design
Prevention of accidents or incidents

questions.question_text: Which of the following, according to ICAO Annex 13, shall be entitled to appoint an accredited representative to participate in the investigation?
options: State conducting the investigation and State of design and manufacturing
All ICAO members States
Any State which, on request, provides information, facilities or experts to the State conducting the investigation

questions.question_text: The accident investigation preliminary report shall be submitted to appropriate States and to the ICAO, In:
options: Any of the world's major languages
One of the working languages of ICAO
The language of the investigating State

questions.question_text: Upon receipt of the modification and a request by the state of occurence for participation, the state of design and the state of manufacture shall in the case of an accident or serious incident inform the state of occurence of the name of its representative to be present at the investigation when the aircraft:
options: Has a maximum mass over 100000kg
Has a maximum mass over 27000kg
Has a maximum mass over 5700kg

questions.question_text: Who is responsible, under Annex 13 of the Chicago convention for the initiation of an accident investigation?
options: The law enforcement authorities of the state in which the aircraft is registered
The aircraft manufacturer
The government of the state in which the accident took place

questions.question_text: Just before arriving on the apron, taxiing inadvertently on the grass, a wheel falls into a hole, which seriously damages the aircraft and obliges the crew to delay departure.
options: This is an accident and the crew must follow the procedure relevant to this case
This is an irregularity in the operation, the crew must inform the operator of the delay caused by necessary repair

Since no physical injury has been noticed and the flight is over, the actions to be taken are related only to insurance, to the repair man, the operator and the persons in charge of the runways and taxiways

questions.question_text: Where an accident or incident occurs to an aircraft in India, then the pilot-in-command of the aircraft shall send notice thereof to:
options: AAIB, DGCA, DM and O-i-C of nearest police station as soon as is reasonably practicable but in any case not later than twenty-four hours
AAIB, DGCA, DM and AAI as soon as is reasonably practicable but in any case not later than twenty-four hours
AAIB, DGCA, DM and O-i-C of nearest police station as soon as is reasonably practicable but in any case not later than forty eight hours

questions.question_text: In the case of an accident the aircraft or any parts or contents thereof may be removed without the authority of DG/AAIB:
options: To look for evidence
If so directed by the P-i-C
To extricate the body of a dead dog
